remarks: The identity arrow in the category of sets is the identity function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
setccat.c $e |- C = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
setcid.o $e |- .1. = ( Id ` C ) $.
setcid.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
setcid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. U ) $.
setcid $p |- ( ph -> ( .1. ` X ) = ( _I |` X ) ) $.
